abstract: The Tough-3000 is the first of the company’s rugged line to offer HD video capture (720p) and is also the most affordable Tough model at $230.
snippet: The Tough-3000 is the first of the company’s rugged line to offer HD video capture (720p) and is also the most affordable Tough model at $230.
lead_paragraph: Olympus unwrapped its Stylus Tough-3000 camera at the Consumer Electronics Show last week. The Tough-3000 is the first of the company’s rugged line to offer HD video capture (720p) and is also the most affordable Tough model at $230. The Stylus Tough-3000 can withstand a five-foot drop, is submersible to 10 feet and works in temperatures as low as 14 degrees. These are basically the same specs as the existing $280 Stylus Tough-6000.

headline.main: Rugged, Speedy, Aquatic, Cold-Tolerant. And Not a Seal.
headline.print_headline: Rugged, Speedy, Aquatic, Cold-Tolerant. And Not a Seal.
